import React from 'react' import './RegistrationPage.css' export default function RegistrationPage() { const [regdatadata, setregdatadata] = useState({ username: "", password: "" }) const { username, password } = regdatadata; const changeHandler = e => { setregdatadata({ ...regdatadata, [e.target.name]: [e.target.value] }); } return (
